title: THE TWIDDLERS 60 Boxes of Mini Colouring Pencils - 6 Pencils Per Box, 360 Total - Easy Grip Round Barrel, 9cm Length, Multipack Party Bag Fillers for Kids Birthdays, Classroom Class Gifts
features: ✏️Great Value Mini Pencils: With 360 kids colouring pencils in 60 sets of 6, each in their own coloured box, our large set is perfect for party favours, classrooms, or restaurants. You'll never run out of mini pencils for party bags with this convenient and colourful set.

✏️Comfortable & Easy To Use: The round shape and matching coloured barrels make our kids pencils party bag fillers comfortable and easy to use for younger hands. Our pack of colouring pencils promote creativity and imagination while providing a comfortable grip for hours of drawing and colouring.

✏️Classic Colours: Our mini colouring pencils for party bags come in classic colours like red, orange, yellow, green, light blue, and dark blue, which are easily identifiable and can help kids learn and recognise colours. The colours do not fade or smudge easily.

✏️Convenient Little Pencils: These mini pencil packs come pre-sharpened and pre-packaged, making our small colouring pencils a convenient and time-saving option for busy parents, teachers, or party planners.

✏️Colouring Pencils Party Bag Fillers: Ideal as party favours, for art projects, drawing, and colouring at home or school, our party bag colouring pencils bulk offer a versatile and colourful solution for parents and teachers.
description: Product Description Classroom uses Perfect for school projects that includes variety of art and craft activities such as drawing and colouring. Our multi-packs are made for class sizes Perfect for travel Mess-free activity that can be done anywhere, whether it's on a plane, train, or in a car. Ideal for travel as they are easy to carry around. Party bag filler Provide a fun and engaging activity that can keep children occupied and entertained, especially during parties or other social events. Home activity Offer a fun and creative home activity for children and parent. They can help improve focus, relieve stress, and foster artistic expression. Premium quality Our premium quality colouring pencils have a smooth and even colour application that produces vibrant and consistent colours. The colours are highly pigmented and it is more intense and vivid than standard colouring pencils. They are comfortable, ergonomic, and non-toxic. Birch wood Our colouring pencils are made of high quality birch wood, which is perfect material for colouring pencils, as it can withstand repeated use without breaking or splintering.
